original_text: You shall be over my house, and all my people shall order themselves as you command. Only as regards the throne will I be greater than you.”
korean_text: 너는 내 집을 다스리라 내 백성이 다 네 명령에 복종하리니 내가 너보다 높은 것은 내 왕좌뿐이니라

sentences.original_text: You shall be over my house
and all my people shall order themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내 모든 백성은 너의 명령에 따를 것이다

sentences.original_text: will I be greater than you
